data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And The Financial Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 30, 33, 52 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and
Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the Audited Financial Results of the Bank for
the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023 duly approved by the Board of Directors of the Bank at its meeting
held today i.e. on May 5, 2023, along with the Audit Report of the Joint Statutory Auditors of the Bank viz.
M/s. S. R. Batliboi & Associates LLP, Chartered Accountants and M/s. Sundaram & Srinivasan, Chartered
Accountants.
The Joint Statutory Auditors of the Bank, have issued the Audit Report on the Financial Results of the Bank for
the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023 with unmodified opinion.

Unaudited Financial Results (Limited Reviewed) of the Bank for the third quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report of the Joint Statutory Auditors in this regard.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Post publication of the Quarterly Results on Saturday, January 28, 2023, DCB Bank Limited has scheduled an Earnings Conference Call with analysts and investors to present the Q3 FY 2022-23 results, on Saturday, January 28, 2023 at 19.00 Hrs IST.The Q-3 FY 2022-23 results and related Investor Presentation after being released to BSE and NSE, will be made available on the Bank''s website www.dcbbank.com. Subsequent to the aforesaid Earnings Call, the audio recording and  transcript of the same will also be made available on the Bank''s website.Please take the above information on your record in compliance with the disclosure requirements under Regulation 30 and other applicable regulations, if any, of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption:
Unaudited Financial Results (Limited Reviewed) For The
2Nd Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the disclosure requirements under Regulation 30 read with Regulation 33 and Regulation 52(4) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations), we enclose herewith the following:

1. Unaudited Financial Results (Limited Reviewed) of the Bank, for the 2nd Quarter and the Half Year ended September 30, 2022, duly considered by the Audit Committee of the Board and subsequently approved by the Board of Directors in today's meeting which concluded at 2.10 p.m.; and

2. Limited Review Report dated November 05, 2022 for the 2nd Quarter and the Half Year ended September 30, 2022 issued by the Bank's Joint Statutory Auditors M/s. S. R. Batliboi & Associates LLP, Chartered Accountants (Registration No.101049W/E300004) and M/s. Sundaram & Srinivasan, Chartered Accountants, (ICAI Registration No. 004207S).

1. Unaudited Financial Results (Limited Reviewed) of the Bank, for the 2nd Quarter and the Half Year ended September 30, 2021, duly considered by the Audit Committee of the Board and subsequently approved by the Board of Directors in today's meeting which concluded at 4.45 p.m.; and

2. Limited Review Report dated October 30, 2021 for the 2nd Quarter and the Half Year ended September 30, 2021 issued by the Bank's Joint Statutory Auditors M/s. S. R. Batliboi & Associates LLP, Chartered Accountants (Registration No.101049W/E300004) and M/s. Sundaram & Srinivasan, Chartered Accountants, (ICAI Registration No. 004207S).

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated August 06, 2021 giving intimation of the earning call to be held on August 07, 2021, the Bank has hosted the audio recording of the earnings call held on August 07, 2021 post declaration of the of the Quarterly Results on August 07, 2021 for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 and the same are available at the link given below:

https://www.dcbbank.com/pdfs/Q1FY22EarningsCall.mp3

Please take the above information on your record in compliance with the disclosure requirements under Regulation 30 and other applicable regulations, if any, of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Results Press Release for June 30, 2021
data.news_body:
DCB Bank Ltd has informed BSE about :

1. Result Press Release for the period ended June 30, 2021

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: In the attachment please find an 'Investor Presentation - Q 1 FY 2022 - August 07, 2021'

data.caption:
Unaudited Financial Results (Limited Reviewed) For The
Quarter Ended June 30, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the disclosure requirements under Regulation 30 read with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations), we are sending herewith the following:
1. Unaudited Financial Results for the 1st quarter ended June 30, 2021, duly considered by the Audit Committee of the Board, which were approved by the Board of Directors in today's meeting which concluded at 06.05 p.m.; and

2. Limited Review Report dated August 07, 2021 for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 by the Statutory Auditors M/s. S. R. Batliboi & Associates LLP, Chartered Accountants (Registration No.101049W/E300004).

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Post publication of the Quarterly Results on August 07, 2021, DCB Bank Limited has scheduled an earnings call with analyst and investors to present the Q1 FY 2021-22 results, on Saturday, August 07, 2021 at 19.15 Hrs IST.

The Q-1 FY 2021-22 results and related Investor Presentation after being released to BSE and NSE will be available on the Bank''s website www.dcbbank.com. Subsequent to the aforesaid earnings call, the audio recording and the transcript of the same will also be made available on the Bank''s website.

data.caption:
Disclosures Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended
March 31, 2021
data.news_body: In Compliance with the requirement under regulation 23 (9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we submit herewith the disclosure on Related Party Transactions on consolidated basis, in the format specified in the relevant accounting standards for annual results, for the half year ended March 31, 2021.

data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated May 06, 2021 giving intimation of the Earning Call to be held on May, 08, 2021, the Bank has hosted the audio recording & transcript of the earnings call held on May 8, 2021 post declaration of the audited annual financial results for the year ended March 31, 2021 and the same are available at the link given below:

https://www.dcbbank.com/cms/showpage/page/for-investor-analyst

Please take the above information on your record in compliance with the disclosure requirements under Regulation 30 and other applicable regulations, if any, of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
